snippet: Some conference commissioners have discussed creating a “superdivision” in college sports, but the deal that created the College Football Playoff could keep that from happening.
abstract: Some college athletic conference commissioners have discussed creating 'superdivision' in college sports, but deal that created College Football Playoff could keep that from happening.
lead_paragraph: Some conference commissioners have discussed creating a “superdivision” in college sports, but the deal that created the College Football Playoff could keep that from happening.

headline.main: Playoff Contract Could Stand in the Way of Conferences Considering a Split
headline.print_headline: Playoff Contract Could Stand in the Way of Conferences Considering a Split
